Arch Hosting - https://archhosting.net


Arch Hosting is proud to offer high quality virtual servers at an affordable price. When we created our virtual server platform, we had three core goals in mind: speed, reliability, and affordability. The end result was an extremely powerful platform at a very low cost to the consumer - you.


Our infrastructure consists of reliable dedicated servers colocated with CentriLogic for our eastern US locations and QuadraNet for our western US locations. These datacenters are reputable for their quality networking and impeccable uptime. We take pride in our work, and every part of our infrastructure was built with performance and reliability in mind. We currently have a very limited stock, so don’t delay!


Why Arch Hosting?

24/7/365 Premium Support - But don't take our word for it - check out our reviews on Facebook!

3 Day Money Back Guarantee - No questions asked.

99.99% Uptime - And an SLA to guarantee it.

1 Gbps Dedicated Network - Say goodbye to network bottlenecks slowing your innovation!

Legal US business - Registered, colocated, and developed in Los Angeles.

2 Years In Business - We've been providing reliable hosting services since 2015.

IPv6 Ready - Future-proof your business.


What’s so special about your KVM plans?

New location and servers! Use the promo code ‘FALL’ for 10% off your order!

Pure, brand new Samsung 850 Pro SSDs

3 Gbps of real layer 4 DDoS protection

Los Angeles datacenter, great pings to North America and Asia!
